Four members of the Saddle Club
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four women ride horses in a fenced area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Horseback riding; Horses
Gordon, Shirley; Hill, Shirley; Orr, Ernestine; Taliaferro, Mary
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal of November 16, 1944. From left to right, Ernestine Orr, Mary Taliaferro, Shirley Hill and Shirley Gordon.
